lead_paragraph: Two police officers, part of the city’s gang-suppression unit, were shot during a stop late on Thursday, one fatally.

byline.contributor: Daniel Victor contributed reporting from New York, Bruce Kauffman from San Diego and Campbell Robertson from Baton Rouge, La.

headline.main: Suspect Held in Shooting of San Diego Police Officers
